The AlphaSimR package was built to provide a framework for simulating complex plant and animal breeding programs in R. It was based on the [AlphaSim](https://dl.sciencesocieties.org/publications/tpg/articles/0/0/plantgenome2016.02.0013) simulation program which has been used in several publications.
